sentence.Network_en: Most foods are simply tasteless - roast beef is like soft rubber, an orange like unfla - vored gelatin.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French gélatine, from Italian gelatina, from gelata, from Latin (see jelly)

means.word_mean: 1. a colorless water-soluble glutinous protein obtained from animal tissues such as bone and skin
2. an edible jelly (sweet or pungent) made with gelatin and used as a dessert or salad base or a coating for foods
3. a thin translucent membrane used over stage lights for color effects
